title: Phase A Integration Testing: Infrastructure Fixes

comment:

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT:
No TBD, TODO, FIXME, or XXX in authored content. [EXECUTION_SUMMARY] placeholder and empty Execution table are appropriate for pre-review phase of an emergent-fix CR.
